Moo::RenderSetSplit

Moo::RenderSetSplit Class Reference

This class implements the RenderSet interface, this implementation splits the renderset into multiple rendersets so that bone limits are preserved. More...

Detailed Description

This class implements the RenderSet interface, this implementation splits the renderset into multiple rendersets so that bone limits are preserved.
